hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #the hero#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #House of Twins#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ocarina#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
